title: Mini-Ep 157: Holiday Gift Guide 2020
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 157: Holiday Gift Guide 2020
itunes:subtitle: Kate and Doree share their long list of holiday gift ideas for all the people in your life (including yourself). This year’s gift guide covers it all, from skincare products and books, to clothes, games, and jewelry; plus 2020-appropriate gifts like ha...
description:
Kate and Doree share their long list of holiday gift ideas for all the people in your life (including yourself). This year’s gift guide covers it all, from skincare products and books, to clothes, games, and jewelry; plus 2020-appropriate gifts like hand sanitizer and face masks.


Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on this episode.


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

STORYWORTH - For $20 off, visit storyworth.com/forever35.

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

LEGACYBOX - Go to legacybox.com/forever35 for 40% off.

MASTERCLASS - Visit masterclass.com/forever35 for 15% off the Annual All-Access Pass.

BOMBAS - For 20% off your first purchase of Bombas, visit bombas.com/forever35.

AURA FRAMES - Get 15% off their purchase with the code forever35 at auraframes.com.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
